data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 8,045 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Vas.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Vas, Hungary
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Vas, Hungary.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 32 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Vas, Hungary be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Vas, Hungary, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Bosniak people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Jesus, teach the local leaders in Vas, Hungary to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Father, help the 8,045 believers in Vas to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Vas with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

location.name: Vas
location.people_groups_list: Chinese, general, Turk, Jew, Hungarian-speaking, Arab, general, Vietnamese
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Chinese, general (6,400), Turk (2,500), Jew, Hungarian-speaking (47,000), Arab, general (5,200), Vietnamese (3,300)
